name: Free Brutalist Templates
description:
Download now a pack of 15 exclusive brutalist designs, ready to use and created in vector format to edit in any program you want.

Based on the brutalist style, to give a different look to your business with a new trend that will make you stand out from the competitors.


Highlights:

  • Easy to edit, add or delete objects.
  • Organized components
  • Vectorized and scalable.
  • Figma and SVG files
  • Personal license (with the premium you can get a commercial version)


Each design completely different with a great variety in fonts, colors and layout, to create an unique look perfect for your needs.


Premium: more than 80 ready-to-use brutalist templates


Check out Creative Toolkit, the largest design resource package out there
